headline: Principal Financial Group (NasdaqGS:PFG) Reports Earnings Rebound Despite 6% Stock Dip Last Quarter
summary: Principal Financial Group (NasdaqGS:PFG) has announced a solid rebound in earnings for the fourth quarter of 2024, with net income and revenue showing significant year-over-year growth. Alongside these positive earnings, the company raised its first-quarter 2025 dividend and announced a substantial share buyback program. Despite these strong corporate actions, Principal's stock price registered a decline of 6.38% over the last quarter. This movement mirrors broader market trends, as the S&P...
